price: Wͻkaa sε: “Daabi, nanso yεbεtoo y’agyanom sε saa ara na na wͻreyε”.
arabic: قَالُواْ بَلۡ وَجَدۡنَآ ءَابَآءَنَا كَذَٰلِكَ يَفۡعَلُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qālū bal wajadnā ābāanā kadhālika yafʿalūna
